summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 4443, entitled "An Ordinance to fix, regulate and control the use and price of the water supplied by the City Water Works, and providing penalties for the violation thereof", approved March 9, 1897, and Ordinance No. 5940, approved May 1, 1900, No. 6590, approved February 26, 1901 and No. 7500, approved December 4, 1901, amendatory thereof.
